mapper.insert: insert into point_charge (vendor_no, point, reg_date) VALUES (#{request.vendor_no}, #{request.point}, #{now})
mapper.select: select charge_no, point, status, reg_date, read_check from point_charge WHERE vendor_no = #{vendor_no} ORDER BY reg_date DESC, charge_no DESC LIMIT 10

SET @RegDate = (select reg_date from point_charge WHERE charge_no = #{last_index}); select charge_no, point, status, reg_date, read_check from point_charge WHERE vendor_no = #{vendor_no} AND (reg_date < @RegDate OR (reg_date = @RegDate AND charge_no < #{last_index})) ORDER BY reg_date DESC, charge_no DESC LIMIT 10
